content: As an AI language model, I do not have access to your specific circumstances or insurance policy, therefore, I cannot give you personalized advice. Generally speaking, you can make changes to your insurance policy, including downgrading your coverage, if your circumstances change. However, the availability of this option and the specific steps you need to take may vary depending on the type of policy you have and the insurance company you are working with. It's best to contact your insurance provider and discuss your options with them directly.
